एप्रिल छाटणी सामान्यतः पिकांच्या विकासाच्या अवस्थेनुसार केली जाते. आपल्या अंगठीच्या पिकांसाठी, एप्रिलमध्ये छाटणी करण्याची योग्य वेळ म्हणजे पिकांच्या वाढीच्या अवस्थेनुसार. 

आपल्या पिकांच्या विशेष गरजेनुसार आणि स्थानिक हवामानाच्या परिस्थितीनुसार छाटणीची वेळ ठरवा. जर आपल्याला अधिक माहिती हवी असेल, तर कृपया आपल्या स्थानिक कृषी तज्ञांशी संपर्क साधा.
messages.en:
April pruning is usually done according to the stage of development of crops. For your ring crops, the perfect time to prune in April is depending on the growth stage of the crop. 

Determine the pruning time according to the special needs of your crops and local weather conditions. If you would like more information, please contact your local agricultural expert.

messages.content: Nano dap aapi sakaye muskmelon ma
messages.en: Nano dap aapi sakaye muskmelon ma
messages.standalone_question: What is the process for making a nano dap with muskmelon?
messages.standalone_en: What is the process for making a nano dap with muskmelon?

messages.content:
Muskmelon (Kharbuja) ma Nano DAP (Di-Ammonium Phosphate) aapva maate, aapne khyal rakhvu pade che ke aapna crop na current stage ne anusar aapva maate ni matra su che. 

Aapna muskmelon na active stage "Flowering and Fruiting" chhe. Aapne Nano DAP ni aapva maate ni matra ne samajva maate, aapne fertigation schedule ne check karvu pade. 

Hu aapne fertigation schedule ni mahiti aapvu chhu. Thodi vaar maate ruko.:

Aapna muskmelon na "Flowering and Fruiting" stage ma, je week 2 chhe, maate Nano DAP ni aapva maate ni mahiti aavi chhe:

### Current Fertigation Schedule:
1. **Day 1 (Today)**:
   - **Fertigation**:
     - Potassium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre
     - Magnesium Sulphate: 3 kg/acre
   - **Foliar Spray**: 
     - Concentration should not exceed 1% (e.g., 5 kg in 500 liters of water per acre).

2. **Day 4**:
   - **Fertigation**:
     - Calcium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre
     - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre

### Next Schedule (Starting from April 20, 2025):
- **Week 1 of Fruit Maturity**:
  - **Day 1**:
    - Calcium Nitrate: 3 kg/acre (apply separately, 15-20 minutes after other fertilizers).
    - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre.
  - **Day 4**:
    - Sulfate of Potash: 3 kg/acre.

Aap Nano DAP ne aapva maate aapne aavi matra maate dhyan rakhvu pade chhe. Aapne koi vishesh prashna hoy to puchho!

messages.content: जून महीने नेट हाउस मधे कोनति पीके घ्या वी
messages.en: Which PK should I take in the net house in the month of June?
messages.standalone_question: What crops should be planted in a net house in June?
messages.standalone_en: What crops should be planted in a net house in June?
messages.content_transliterated: june mahine net house madhe konti pk ghya v

messages.content:
जून महिन्यात नेट हाउस मध्ये घेतलेल्या काही लोकप्रिय पिकांमध्ये खालील समाविष्ट आहेत:

1. **टोमॅटो** - टोमॅटोचे उत्पादन नेट हाउस मध्ये चांगले होते, कारण यामुळे तापमान नियंत्रित ठेवता येते.
2. **कॅप्सिकम** - कॅप्सिकम साठी नेट हाउस एक उत्तम पर्याय आहे, कारण यामुळे त्याला आवश्यक असलेले तापमान आणि आर्द्रता नियंत्रित करता येते.
3. **काकडी** - काकडी सुद्धा नेट हाउस मध्ये चांगली वाढते.
4. **भाजीपाला** - विविध प्रकारच्या भाज्या जसे की पालक, मेथी, आणि कोथिंबीर सुद्धा नेट हाउस मध्ये घेतल्या जातात.

तुमच्या स्थानिक हवामान आणि बाजारातील मागणीच्या आधारे योग्य पिक निवडणे महत्त्वाचे आहे.
messages.en:
Some of the popular crops grown at Net House in the month of June include:

1. **Tomato** - Tomato production is good in net house, as it allows temperature to be controlled.
2. **Capsicum** - A net house is a great option for capsicum, as it allows it to control the temperature and humidity it needs.
3. **Cucumber** - Cucumbers also grow well in net houses.
4. **Vegetables** - A variety of vegetables such as spinach, fenugreek, and cilantro are also grown at the Net House.

It is important to choose the right crop based on your local climate and market demand.

messages.content: मातीचे तापमान कधीही शून्य होत नाही. जर तुमचा सेन्सर शून्य तापमान दर्शवत असेल, तर ते एक तांत्रिक समस्या असू शकते. कृपया सेन्सरची कनेक्शन तपासा, जर ते ढिले असतील तर त्यांना घट्ट करा आणि डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा. यामुळे अद्ययावत डेटा मिळवता येईल.
messages.en: The soil temperature is never zero. If your sensor is showing zero temperature, it could be a technical problem. Please check the connection of the sensors, tighten them if they are loose, and restart the device. This will allow us to get up-to-date data.

messages.content: माझ्या शेताला पाण्याची आवश्यकता आहे का
messages.en: Does my farm need water?
messages.standalone_question: Does my farm need water?
messages.standalone_en: Does my farm need water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: Do I need to do fertigation on my farm?
A: Fyllo provides a fixed fertigation schedule based on plot and crop details, along with weather forecasting data for farmer plots, to decide the fertilizer/fertigation needs.

Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

**प्लॉट 1 (plot no 1 Arra 35)**:

**प्लॉट 2 (plot no 2 Arra 36)**:
- सध्या मातीची आर्द्रता: 63% (आवश्यक 70%).
- पाण्याची आवश्यकता आहे. आज पाणी देणे योग्य आहे, कारण पावसाची अपेक्षा कमी आहे.

तुम्ही आज पाणी देऊ शकता.

Your farm needs water. 

**Plot 1 (plot no 1 Arra 35)*:
Soil moisture currently: 67% (required 70%).
- Needs water. It is appropriate to water today, because the expectation of rain is low.

**Plot 2 (plot no 2 Arra 36)*:

messages.content: कॅन्सर पिवळ्यामध्ये काटा आल्यानंतर किती टक्क्याला पाणी द्यावे
messages.en: What percentage of water should be watered after cancer yellow
messages.standalone_question: How much water should be given to a plant after a thorn appears in the yellow cancer plant?
messages.standalone_en: How much water should be given to a plant after a thorn appears in the yellow cancer plant?
messages.content_transliterated: cancer pivalyamadhye kata alyanantar kiti takkyala pani dyave

messages.content:
कॅन्सर पिवळ्यामध्ये काटा आल्यानंतर, तुम्हाला मातीच्या आर्द्रतेच्या आधारावर पाणी द्यावे लागेल. सामान्यतः, कॅन्सर पिवळा (Grapes) साठी मातीची आर्द्रता 70% च्या आसपास असावी. 

जर मातीची आर्द्रता 60% पेक्षा कमी असेल, तर तुम्ही 100% पाण्याची आवश्यकता आहे. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटच्या सध्याच्या आर्द्रतेनुसार, तुम्हाला पाण्याची आवश्यकता आहे. तुम्ही 70% पर्यंत पोहोचण्यासाठी आवश्यक पाण्याची मात्रा द्या. 

तुमच्या प्लॉटच्या सध्याच्या आर्द्रतेसाठी मी अधिक माहिती देऊ शकतो, जर तुम्हाला हवी असेल.
messages.en:
Once the cancer is in yellow, you'll need to water based on soil moisture. In general, soil moisture should be around 70% for cancer yellow (grapes). 

If the soil moisture is less than 60%, you need 100% water. 

Depending on the current humidity of your plot, you need water. Give the amount of water you need to reach 70%. 

I can provide more information for the current humidity of your plot, if you want.

messages.content: डेल्टा म्हणजे काय
messages.en: What is Delta?
messages.standalone_question: What does "delta" mean?
messages.standalone_en: What does "delta" mean?

faq:
Q: What is the difference between the predicted delta and the calculated delta?
A: Predicted delta is derived from weather prediction data, whereas calculated delta is derived from live data.

Q: What is Delta T & VPD?
A: Delta T is the difference between dry bulb and wet bulb temperature values. When this value is between 2-9, the stomatal cells on plant leaves are open, increasing the effectiveness of foliar applications.
   VPD (Vapor Pressure Deficit) represents the right time for fertigation when active absorption by a plant is highest.

messages.content_transliterated: delta mhanaje kay

messages.content:
डेल्टा म्हणजे तापमानातील फरक, विशेषतः "ड्राय बल्ब" (कोरडे तापमान) आणि "वेट बल्ब" (आर्द्र तापमान) यामध्ये असलेला फरक. 

डेल्टा T चा उपयोग पानांच्या स्टोमेटल पेशींच्या उघडण्याच्या स्थितीचे मूल्यांकन करण्यासाठी केला जातो. जेव्हा डेल्टा T 2 ते 9 दरम्यान असतो, तेव्हा पानांच्या स्टोमेटल पेशी उघडतात, ज्यामुळे फोलिअर अॅप्लिकेशन्सची कार्यक्षमता वाढते. 

यामुळे पाण्याच्या वापराचे व्यवस्थापन आणि फर्टिगेशनच्या योग्य वेळेचे ठरविण्यात मदत होते.
messages.en:
Delta refers to the difference in temperature, especially the difference between "dry bulb" (dry temperature) and "wet bulb" (moist temperature). 

Delta T is used to evaluate the opening status of leaf stomatal cells. When delta T is between 2 and 9, leaf stomatal cells open up, increasing the efficiency of foliar applications. 

This helps in managing water use and deciding the right time for fertigation.

messages.en: When do I need water on my farm?
messages.standalone_question: When does my field need water?
messages.standalone_en: When does my field need water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

messages.content:
તમારા પાક "Muskmelon" માટે, હાલની સક્રિય તબક્કો "Fruit maturity" છે, જે 28 માર્ચ 2025 થી શરૂ થયો છે. 

આ તબક્કામાં, પાકની કાપણી માટેની આગામી તબક્કો "Harvest" છે. સામાન્ય રીતે, "Fruit maturity" તબક્કો લગભગ 15-20 દિવસ સુધી ચાલે છે. 

તેથી, તમારું પાક કાપવા માટે લગભગ 10-15 દિવસ બાકી છે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
For your crop "Muskmelon", the current active phase is "Fruit maturity", which has started from 28 March 2025. 

In this phase, the next stage for harvesting the crop is "harvesting". Generally, the "Fruit Maturity" phase lasts for about 15-20 days. 

So, there are about 10-15 days left for you to harvest your crop. 

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content:
તમારા ખેતરમાં, "Teba Valo Palot" માં, 4 એપ્રિલ 2025 ના રોજ ભમરા માટેની સ્પ્રે કરવાની ભલામણ કરવામાં આવી હતી. આ સ્પ્રે માટેની કેટલીક દવાઓ છે:

1. **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC** - 0.5 મીલીલિટર
2. **Diafenthiuron** - 0.6 ગ્રામ

અથવા

1. **Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25%** - 0.5 ગ્રામ
2. **Thiacloprid** - 0.8 મીલીલિટર

અથવા

1. **Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP** - 1 ગ્રામ
2. **Thiamethoxam 25% WG + Lamdacyhalothrin 5% SC** - 0.5 મીલીલિટર

જો તમે આ સ્પ્રે કરી છે અને હજુ પણ ભમરા દેખાતા નથી, તો થોડીવાર રાહ જુઓ. જો ફાઇલો એપ્લિકેશન ફરીથી સ્પ્રે કરવાની ભલામણ કરે છે, તો પછી ફરીથી સ્પ્રે કરો. 

જો તમને વધુ મદદ જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
On your farm, "Teba Valo Palot", spraying for bumblebees was recommended on April 4, 2025. Some of the medications for this spray are:

1. **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC** - 0.5 milliliters
2. **Diafenthiuron** - 0.6 g

or

1. **Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25%** - 0.5 grams
2. **Thiacloprid** - 0.8 milliliters

or

1. **Captan 70% + Hexaconazole 5% WP** - 1 gram
2. **Thiamethoxam 25% WG + Lamdacyhalothrin 5% SC** - 0.5 milliliters

If you've sprayed this and still don't look bumblebees, wait a while. If the files recommend re-spraying the application, then spray again. 

If you need more help, let me know!

messages.content:
ટેટી (મસકમેલોન) ની સાઈઝ અને ગુણવત્તા સુધારવા માટે, તમે NPK ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો. સામાન્ય રીતે, 20-20-20 અથવા 15-30-15 જેવા ખાતરો યોગ્ય રહેશે. 

આ ખાતરોમાં નાઈટ્રોજન, ફોસ્ફોરસ અને પોટેશિયમનું સંતુલિત પ્રમાણ છે, જે પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને ફળના વિકાસ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. 

તમે ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરતી વખતે, જમીનની સ્થિતિ અને પાકની જરૂરિયાતોનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
To improve the size and quality of the teti (muscumelon), you can use NPK fertilizers. Generally, fertilizers like 20-20-20 or 15-30-15 will be suitable. 

These fertilizers contain a balanced amount of nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium, which are important for crop growth and fruit growth. 

While you use fertilizer, it is important to take care of the condition of the soil and the requirements of the crop. 

If you need more information, let me know!

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
The size of one acre is 43,560 square feet. 

When using fertilizer, it is important to decide how much fertilizer to use in an acre, according to the type of fertilizer and crop requirements. Generally, fertilizer is used in 100-200 kg per acre, but this depends on the type of crop and the condition of the soil.

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content:
ટેટી (મસકમેલોન) ની સાઈઝ અને ગુણવત્તા સુધારવા માટે, તમે નીચેના ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **NPK 20-20-20** અથવા **15-30-15** - આ ખાતરોમાં નાઈટ્રોજન, ફોસ્ફોરસ અને પોટેશિયમનું સંતુલિત પ્રમાણ છે, જે પાકની વૃદ્ધિ અને ફળના વિકાસ માટે મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

**એકરે ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ:**
- સામાન્ય રીતે, 100-200 કિલોગ્રામ ખાતર પ્રતિ એકર વાપરવું યોગ્ય છે. 
- ખાસ કરીને, 150 કિલોગ્રામ NPK ખાતર પ્રતિ એકર એક સારી શરૂઆત હોઈ શકે છે.

ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરતી વખતે, જમીનની સ્થિતિ અને પાકની જરૂરિયાતોનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે. 

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
To improve the size and quality of the teti (muscamalone), you can use the following fertilizers:

1. **NPK 20-20-20** or **15-30-15** - These fertilizers have a balanced amount of nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium, which is important for crop growth and fruit growth.

**Acre fertilizer usage:**
Generally, 100-200 kg of fertilizer per acre is worth using. 
In particular, 150 kilograms of NPK fertilizer per acre can be a good start.

While using fertilizers, it is important to take care of the condition of the soil and the requirements of the crop. 

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content:
મરચામાં કૂકડો (અથવા કૂકડા) માટે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Chlorpyrifos** - 2-3 મીલીલિટર પ્રતિ લિટર પાણીમાં મિશ્રિત કરો.
2. **Thiamethoxam** - 0.5 ગ્રામ પ્રતિ લિટર પાણીમાં મિશ્રિત કરો.

આ દવાઓ કૂકડાને નિયંત્રિત કરવામાં મદદ કરશે. સ્પ્રે કરતી વખતે, સૂર્યપ્રકાશમાં ન કરો અને વરસાદી દિવસોમાં સ્પ્રે ન કરો.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
For chickens (or chickens) in chili, you can use the following medications:

1. **Chlorpyrifos** - Mix in 2-3 milliliters per litre of water.
2. **Thiamethoxam** - Mix in 0.5 grams per litre of water.

These medicines will help in controlling the dog. While spraying, do not indulge in sunlight and do not spray on rainy days.

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content:
મરચામાં વધુ ફળો માટે, તમે નીચેના ખાતરો અને દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### ખાતરો:
1. **NPK 20-20-20** - આ ખાતર ફળના વિકાસને પ્રોત્સાહિત કરે છે.
2. **Calcium Nitrate** - ફળના ગુણવત્તા અને કદને સુધારવા માટે ઉપયોગી છે.
3. **Potassium Sulfate** - ફળના સ્વાદ અને રંગને સુધારવા માટે મદદ કરે છે.

### દવાઓ:
1. **Growth Regulators**: 
   - **Gibberellic Acid** - ફળના વિકાસને પ્રોત્સાહિત કરવા માટે.
   - **NAA (Naphthalene Acetic Acid)** - ફળના ગળવા અને વૃદ્ધિ માટે.

### ઉપયોગ:
- ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ 100-150 કિલોગ્રામ પ્રતિ એકર કરી શકાય છે, પરંતુ પાકની જરૂરિયાતો અને જમીનની સ્થિતિને ધ્યાનમાં રાખીને આમાં ફેરફાર કરી શકાય છે.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
For more fruits in chili, you can use the following fertilizers and medications:

### Fertilizers:
1. **NPK 20-20-20** - This fertilizer promotes the growth of the fruit.
2. **Calcium Nitrate** - useful for improving the quality and size of the fruit.
3. **Potassium Sulfate** - Helps to improve the taste and color of the fruit.

### Medicines:
1. **Growth Regulators**: 
   * **Gibberellic Acid** - To encourage fruit growth.
   **NAA (Naphthalene Acetic Acid)** - For fruit melting and growth.

### Usage:
Fertilizers can be used at 100-150 kg per acre, but this can be modified keeping in mind the crop requirements and the condition of the land.

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content: મારા ખેતરમાં પાણીની ક્યારે જરૂર છે
messages.en: When do I need water on my farm?
messages.standalone_question: When does my field need water?
messages.standalone_en: When does my field need water?

tools:
should_i_give_water  
Checks the current and optimal soil moisture values and decides whether the farmer should give water to the plot now or today.
faq:
Q: When should I water? (Hindi: Paani kab dun?)
A: 0-5 kPa is wet, and increasing kPa means increasing dryness. The crop should stay in its optimal moisture zone, and when very close or above the dry optimal moisture, water can be given. Check internal irrigation forecast for the correct answer.

Q: Why should I water my crop?
A: Watering your crop is essential to maintain the right moisture balance for healthy growth. Fyllo provides soil monitoring sensors that can provide irrigation precise requirement forecasting. The forecast will also provide the details for why and when you should irrigate.

Q: How much to irrigate after receiving notification?
A: The net quantity of water to be applied depends on the moisture deficit in the soil, leaching requirement, and expectancy of rainfall. When no rainfall is expected and the soil is not saline, the net quantity equals the moisture deficit in the soil.

Q: In the latest irrigation , sensor didn't drop to 0.
A: 0 to 5 Kpa means soil is fully wet. It need not drop to 0 every time. Moisture less than 5 also means wet conditions. So, need not worry. Also ask to wait for 12 hours after irrigation.

Q: What should I do if the soil moisture sensor always shows wet values?
A: Verify the irrigation frequency, check the installation point, and contact Fyllo representative if the issue persists.

આ તબક્કામાં, પાકની કાપણી માટેની આગામી તબક્કો "Harvest" છે. સામાન્ય રીતે, "Fruit maturity" તબક્કો લગભગ 15-20 દિવસ સુધી ચાલે છે. 

તેથી, તમારું પાક કાપવા માટે લગભગ 10-15 દિવસ બાકી છે.

messages.en:
For your crop "Muskmelon", the current active phase is "Fruit maturity", which has started from 28 March 2025. 

In this phase, the next stage for harvesting the crop is "harvesting". Generally, the "Fruit Maturity" phase lasts for about 15-20 days. 

So, there are about 10-15 days left for you to harvest your crop. 

If you need more information, let me know!

અથવા

જો તમે આ સ્પ્રે કરી છે અને હજુ પણ ભમરા દેખાતા નથી, તો થોડીવાર રાહ જુઓ. જો ફાઇલો એપ્લિકેશન ફરીથી સ્પ્રે કરવાની ભલામણ કરે છે, તો પછી ફરીથી સ્પ્રે કરો.

1. **Azoxystrobin 18.2% + Difenoconazole 11.4% SC** - 0.5 milliliters
2. **Diafenthiuron** - 0.6 g

or

1. **Tebuconazole 50% + Trifloxystrobin 25%** - 0.5 grams

તમે ખાતરનો ઉપયોગ કરતી વખતે, જમીનની સ્થિતિ અને પાકની જરૂરિયાતોનું ધ્યાન રાખવું મહત્વપૂર્ણ છે.

**Acre fertilizer usage:**
Generally, 100-200 kg of fertilizer per acre is worth using. 
In particular, 150 kilograms of NPK fertilizer per acre can be a good start.

While using fertilizers, it is important to take care of the condition of the soil and the requirements of the crop. 

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content: મરચામાં કૂકડો માટે કઈ દવા નાખવી જોઈએ
messages.en: What medicine should be added to the chili for the dog
messages.standalone_question: What medicine should be used for controlling aphids in chili plants?
messages.standalone_en: What medicine should be used for controlling aphids in chili plants?
messages.content_transliterated: maracaman kukado mate kai dava nakhavi joie

messages.content:
મરચામાં કૂકડો (અથવા કૂકડા) માટે, તમે નીચેની દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

1. **Chlorpyrifos** - 2-3 મીલીલિટર પ્રતિ લિટર પાણીમાં મિશ્રિત કરો.
2. **Thiamethoxam** - 0.5 ગ્રામ પ્રતિ લિટર પાણીમાં મિશ્રિત કરો.

આ દવાઓ કૂકડાને નિયંત્રિત કરવામાં મદદ કરશે. સ્પ્રે કરતી વખતે, સૂર્યપ્રકાશમાં ન કરો અને વરસાદી દિવસોમાં સ્પ્રે ન કરો.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
For chickens (or chickens) in chili, you can use the following medications:

1. **Chlorpyrifos** - Mix in 2-3 milliliters per litre of water.
2. **Thiamethoxam** - Mix in 0.5 grams per litre of water.

These medicines will help in controlling the dog. While spraying, do not indulge in sunlight and do not spray on rainy days.

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.standalone_en: What fertilizer or pesticide should be used to increase the yield of chili peppers?

Fungicide: Thiram – 2 to 3 gm/kg seed

messages.content_transliterated: maracaman vadhu fall mate kai dava athava khatar apavo joie

messages.content:
મરચામાં વધુ ફળો માટે, તમે નીચેના ખાતરો અને દવાઓનો ઉપયોગ કરી શકો છો:

### ખાતરો:
1. **NPK 20-20-20** - આ ખાતર ફળના વિકાસને પ્રોત્સાહિત કરે છે.
2. **Calcium Nitrate** - ફળના ગુણવત્તા અને કદને સુધારવા માટે ઉપયોગી છે.
3. **Potassium Sulfate** - ફળના સ્વાદ અને રંગને સુધારવા માટે મદદ કરે છે.

### દવાઓ:
1. **Growth Regulators**: 
   - **Gibberellic Acid** - ફળના વિકાસને પ્રોત્સાહિત કરવા માટે.
   - **NAA (Naphthalene Acetic Acid)** - ફળના ગળવા અને વૃદ્ધિ માટે.

### ઉપયોગ:
- ખાતરોનો ઉપયોગ 100-150 કિલોગ્રામ પ્રતિ એકર કરી શકાય છે, પરંતુ પાકની જરૂરિયાતો અને જમીનની સ્થિતિને ધ્યાનમાં રાખીને આમાં ફેરફાર કરી શકાય છે.

જો તમને વધુ માહિતી જોઈએ, તો મને જણાવો!
messages.en:
For more fruits in chili, you can use the following fertilizers and medications:

### Fertilizers:
1. **NPK 20-20-20** - This fertilizer promotes the growth of the fruit.
2. **Calcium Nitrate** - useful for improving the quality and size of the fruit.
3. **Potassium Sulfate** - Helps to improve the taste and color of the fruit.

### Medicines:
1. **Growth Regulators**: 
   * **Gibberellic Acid** - To encourage fruit growth.
   **NAA (Naphthalene Acetic Acid)** - For fruit melting and growth.

### Usage:
Fertilizers can be used at 100-150 kg per acre, but this can be modified keeping in mind the crop requirements and the condition of the land.

If you need more information, let me know!

messages.content:
तुम्ही पाणी सोडले आहे, तरी मशीनने प्रतिसाद देत नसेल तर काही गोष्टी तपासाव्यात:

1. **सेंसरची स्थिती**: कृपया तपासा की सेंसर योग्य प्रकारे मातीमध्ये स्थापित आहे का.
2. **ड्रिप सिस्टीम**: ड्रिप सिस्टीममध्ये अडथळा आहे का? ड्रिपर चांगले कार्य करत आहेत का?
3. **पाण्याचा प्रवाह**: पाण्याचा प्रवाह योग्य आहे का? ड्रिपर सेंसरच्या जवळ आहेत का?

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याची इच्छा आहे का?
messages.en:
If the machine doesn't respond even if you've released water, here are a few things to check:

1. **Status of the sensor**: Please check that the sensor is properly installed in the soil.
2. **Drip System**: Is there a barrier to the drip system? Are drippers doing a good job?
3. **Water flow**: Is the flow of water right? Are drippers close to sensors?

If you're still having a problem, do you want to open a ticket?

जर सेन्सर काम करत नसेल, तर तुम्ही खालील गोष्टी तपासू शकता:

1. **सेन्सर कनेक्शन**: सेन्सरची कनेक्शन तपासा, कनेक्शन ढिल आहे का ते बघा.
2. **डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करा**: डिव्हाइस रीस्टार्ट करून पाहा, कधी कधी यामुळे समस्या सुटू शकते.
3. **सेन्सरची स्थिती**: सेन्सर योग्य प्रकारे मातीमध्ये स्थापित आहे का ते तपासा.
4. **पाण्याचा प्रवाह**: पाण्याचा प्रवाह योग्य आहे का? ड्रिपर चांगले कार्य करत आहेत का?

जर तुम्हाला अजूनही समस्या येत असेल, तर तुम्ही तिकीट उघडण्याची इच्छा आहे का?
messages.en:
If the sensor doesn't work, you can check the following:

1. **Sensor Connection**: Check the connection of the sensor, see if the connection is loose.
2. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart, sometimes it can solve the problem.
3. **Position of the sensor**: Check that the sensor is properly installed in the soil.
4. **Water flow**: Is the flow of water appropriate? Are drippers doing a good job?

If you're still having a problem, do you want to open a ticket?

Q: How do I contact customer support for Fyllo?
A: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in. Do you want me to raise a support ticket for you?

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

Q: How can I reset or restart the Fyllo crop stage on the app?
A: For Hindi instructions, please watch this video: [फसल की स्टेज कैसे अपडेट करे ?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/Gx2XUOGqNoA/mqdefault.jpg). For English instructions, please watch this video: [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/knCXf0vdN7k/mqdefault.jpg). For additional info, contact the CRM team: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in.
Make sure to give both hindi and english links.

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

2. **Restart the device**: Try the device restart, sometimes it can solve the problem.
3. **Position of the sensor**: Check that the sensor is properly installed in the soil.
4. **Water flow**: Is the flow of water appropriate? Are drippers doing a good job?

If you're still having a problem, do you want to open a ticket?

Q: How do I contact customer support for Fyllo?
A: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in. Do you want me to raise a support ticket for you?

Q: What makes Fyllo different from its competitors?
A: Fyllo differentiates itself through:
 - Precision & accuracy due to unique installation and sensor positioning.
 - Agronomical Algorithms created by a team of scientists led by Dr. Shikhamany, who is considered by many as the father of Indian grape industry.
 - 100% customer retention: Fyllo is known for its service on the ground, 24-hour issue resolution.
 - User-friendly interface that's easy to understand for all language and age group users.

Q: How can I reset or restart the Fyllo crop stage on the app?
A: For Hindi instructions, please watch this video: [फसल की स्टेज कैसे अपडेट करे ?](https://youtu.be/Gx2XUOGqNoA) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/Gx2XUOGqNoA/mqdefault.jpg). For English instructions, please watch this video: [How to update crop stages in App?](https://youtu.be/knCXf0vdN7k) (Thumbnail: https://img.youtube.com/vi/knCXf0vdN7k/mqdefault.jpg). For additional info, contact the CRM team: You can contact customer support by calling the helpline number at (+91) 9380908040 or by emailing contact@fyllo.in.
Make sure to give both hindi and english links.

Q: How does the Fyllo device work?
A: The Fyllo device captures data from 11 sensors at regular intervals. This data is then analyzed using Fyllo's Weather & Agronomical Algorithms to provide alerts to farmers for disease & pest management, irrigation management, fertigation management, and weather prediction.

Q: My Kairo/Nero device is not working.
A: If some issue is being faced, user can raise the support ticket in the Fyllo app. If the issue is not solved please contact Fyllo customer support for further assistance. Do you want me to raise the support ticket for you?
